attributes.action: uk stop sending arms to saudi arabia and help save yemen from there crisis !
attributes.additional_details:
I personally feel like we should replace the profit from arms trading to saudi arabia with investments with education which in turn will make the country more intelligent and richer.
I also feel like we send food over to yemen and foreign aid to save the country from there humanitarian crisis and donate money to charities such as :
Unicef
yemen children’s relief 
donate to help feed yemeni kids 
saba relief
attributes.background: We want the government to stop selling arms to saudi arabia which are used to commit horrific war crimes in yemen .We also want the uk to help yemen in the crisis through foreign aid , sending food and attempting diplomatic agreements to end the viscous war
